transcription: I often wonder how we find ourselves in these situations.  I give you people a simple task... and you fail in every possible manner. Now I'm left with one request. Explain. I did exactly what you wanted me to do. I searched every possible location where he could be hiding.  This was the only obvious place. So explain to me why your efforts feel... wasted. I can still help you. I'm still useful. It has been six months since the Gotham incident. And my prey still eludes me. Having sacrificed both time and personal hygiene, I intend to find the location of Mr. Wayne.  and destroy him. Are those paddle boats? Oh! What? Oh! Why do you never see the man in a paddle boat alone? Fascists!  Hello! I don't understand! Stop mocking me!  This endeavor has been a failure. But I will find the Bat. And he will meet his end. I just hope that he's in Disneyland. I love Goofy.  so  you
